items.content_html: Hashless is a lightweight, high-performance hashing and verification library designed for serverless environments like AWS Lambda and Cloudflare Workers. It provides secure, efficient, and dependency-free hashing solutions optimized for edge computing and cloud-native applications.
items.title: Jenil-Desai/Hashless: Hashless is a lightweight, high-performance hashing and verification library designed for serverless environments like AWS Lambda and Cloudflare Workers. It provides secure, efficient, and dependency-free hashing solutions optimized for edge computing and cloud-native applications.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Ultra Mega Enumerator is a lightweight library designed to enumerate various combinatorial objects. Its goal is to provide efficient tools for generating combinations, permutations, compositions, partitions, and more.
items.title: ncg777/ultra-mega-enumerator: Ultra Mega Enumerator is a lightweight library designed to enumerate various combinatorial objects. Its goal is to provide efficient tools for generating combinations, permutations, compositions, partitions, and more.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anygrid: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.

items.content_html: TabooTyper is a lightweight JavaScript package that helps you maintain a friendly and respectful environment in your web applications by automatically filtering or masking inappropriate or offensive words as users type in input fields and text areas.
